hello: Hi, My name is Trang but you can also call me Lucide,
hello2: I can be a UI/UX/Web Designer and Front-end Developer
helloDes: Explore my work and get to know me.
description: I am currently a fourth-year student at Digital Hollywood University in Tokyo, primarily focusing on web design, UI/UX design. My passion for the creative field started in high school, and during my time at university, I discovered a new passion for web development. In my free time, I enjoy photography, playing music games, and engaging in retail activities. As a hobby, I run a small business and hope to continue learning valuable skills. I am excited about exploring internship or job opportunities in web design, web-application and mobile application development.
